-a -v -d 500 -f 0,0,.5,red 
-s 0,5,5,5,100,.2,.25,90,b,s,e
-s 0,-5,5,5,100,.2,.25,90,b,s,e
-s 5,-5,5,5,100,.2,.25,45,b,s,e
-s -5,-5,5,5,100,.2,.25,0,b,s,e
-s -5,-10,5,5,100,.2,.25,0,b,s,e
-s 5,-10,5,5,100,.2,.25,0,b,s,e
# two stimuli -J 4.0,red,0,4,0,50,100,50,50,blue,90,4,0,50,50,50,100,green,180,4,0,50,100,50,100
# three stimuli -J 4.0,red,0,4,4,50,100,50,50,50,50,blue,90,4,2,50,50,50,100,50,50,green,180,4,1,50,100,50,100,50,100
